Class Station

java.lang.Object
Station
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Station>
public class Station extends Object implements Comparable<Station>
Station Information about an individual station: - The name - The coordinates of the station on the map - The set of SubwayLines that go through that station. The constructor just takes the name and coordinates; SubwayLines must then be added to the station, one by one.
